title: AFKS?! Lose less LP if you have an AFK. Lose extra LP if you afk.

replies.body: Or you could be less of an asshole, likely get less AFK's then.
People start a match get into queue select a champion then ... afk its nothing personal

What about when this happens.. Like to me just now.. Internet works fine after just playing a game. get into another then get kicked out of loading screen and can't reconnect due to fuck knows what and losing 16 LP. I laughed

whats lp?
im not ranked yet
LP is the league points you get to go up divisions research on lol wikia.
Loss prevented is only given when a big red button is pushed at rito HQ because of server issues, not because of dc's.

Having an extra penalty for afking maybe. But not less losses for teammates. Its exploitable and rewards people for flaming and making teammates afk when things are going badly. And any balanced system with something like this would also need reduced LP gains if an enemy AFKs, which would actually punish people for stomping lane
I don't know about this, but I might agree with you that afk should get more lost LP than other. With the one who is not afk I thing they should get something to protect them from those who afk.
